body.name: Ambi Even & Clear Advanced Fade Cream, Hydroquinone-free, Hyperpigmentation Treatment, Stubborn Dark Spot Corrector, Results In As Little 2-3 Weeks, Niacinamide, Licorice Root Extract, PHA, 1 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 20 mins
features: Clinically Shown to Fade Dark Spots and Discolorations: Ambi Even & Clear Advanced Fade Cream has been clinically studied to safely fade stubborn dark spots, including those caused by acne, and improve uneven skin tone
Results In As Little As 2-3 Weeks: This formulation fades stubborn dark spots and skin discolorations for an even, natural skin tone in as little as 2-3 weeks

Effective Ingredients: Ambi Even & Clear Advanced Fade Cream contains 5% niacinamide to fight hyperpigmentation and restore skin’s moisture balance; licorice root extract to help reduce the appearance of dark spots and even skin tone; and PHA to exfoliate dead skin cells on the surface and improve texture and skin tone.
For All Skin Types: Ambi Even & Clear Advanced Fade Cream hyperpigmentation treatment is suitable for all skin types: For day and/or night time use

From The Skin Tone Authority: For 50 years, Ambi has been rooted in catering to the skincare needs of women and men of color, blending science and nature to create affordable, high-quality skincare products

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The tube is Small
reviews.reviewText: The first thing I want to say is that the smell of this product surprise me😅 I have read some reviews prior to purchasing this cream but I get to see for myself of what the smell is like. It smells great guys!! 😌The tube is small though, I was expecting something bigger for the price but I guess it’s fine. The lather seems lasting so I don’t think it will be finished anytime soon. It also has consistency, not too thick or thin. I am just waiting to see if this product will work for my skin because I really need these dark spots to be gone for good! 😊 All in all, it is not a bad purchase. You would have to see for your self.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Radiance Restored: Ambi Even & Clear Fade Cream, a Game-Changer!
reviews.reviewText: Ambi Even & Clear Advanced Fade Cream is a true game-changer in the world of hyperpigmentation treatment. It's a radiant transformation that I can't help but share.As someone who has struggled with stubborn dark spots for years, I've tried my fair share of products. When I discovered Ambi Even & Clear, I was cautiously hopeful. What struck me first was the commitment to being hydroquinone-free, focusing on gentle yet effective ingredients.The results have been astonishing. Within just 2-3 weeks of consistent use, I noticed a visible improvement in my dark spots. It's like they were gradually fading away, leaving behind clearer and more even-toned skin. It's a testament to the power of Niacinamide, Licorice Root Extract, and PHA.One of the aspects I appreciate most is the nourishing effect of this cream. It doesn't just fade dark spots; it actively improves the overall health and texture of the skin. It's a comprehensive solution that addresses the root causes of hyperpigmentation.The texture of the cream is velvety and easily absorbed, making it a pleasure to apply. It doesn't leave any greasy residue, and a little goes a long way. The 1 oz size may seem small, but it's incredibly efficient.But the true sweetness of this review lies in the newfound confidence Ambi Even & Clear has given me. I feel comfortable in my skin, and I no longer feel the need to hide behind layers of makeup. This fade cream is more than a skincare product; it's a self-esteem booster.If you're on a journey to clear and radiant skin, Ambi Even & Clear Advanced Fade Cream is your ally. It's a transformative experience that not only fades dark spots but also brings back your confidence. It's a skincare must-have that's worth every drop. Say hello to radiant, even-toned skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always a good buy
reviews.reviewText: My mom lives by this cream for evening her skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I have only been using it for a couple weeks
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't have the best fragrance. Not awful but a little off-putting. It has a sticky feel to it. Not sure why but it doesn't soak into my skin like I expected. I have age spots on my hands that I was trying to fade. After two weeks I haven't noticed much difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does well over time!
reviews.reviewText: This product has been around from the 90’s if not 80’s when it was produced in a red and green tube. Back then it was the go to product for light skin fading/stubborn dark spot removal and even skin toning.This new ambi product is not as potent as it used to be but does get the job done. The potency of this new version is watered down and will take much longer to give the expected effect. After using it for about 4 weeks “as directed” I’ve seen little improvement, however after 6 weeks I began to see big improvements especially with stubborn dark spots. Of course the tube size should be a little bigger but will last a little under 2 months.It will eventually give you the desired results but don’t expect to get those results within a month. It will take a good 2-3 months to achieve the results you want. TIP!!! Use this product along with the ambi “fade serum” for great results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this for a few weeks now and I haven’t noticed any difference in my dark spots. I’ll give it another month to see if there’s any improvement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely impressed with this product! Although I was skeptical that this would work, this product soon eased all my concerns. In fact, I could clearly see, quite literally, a difference in my dark spots day after day. This product is nothing like any other product I have tried before. I also love that it is geared towards people with a darker complexion. I am overall very pleased with this product and I definitely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
